title: Budgie 10.8 Desktop Released with New Trash Applet, Budgie Menu Improvements
description:
Budgie 10.8 desktop environment is out now with StatusNotifier support in System Tray, Budgie Menu improvements, new Budgie Trash applet, and more.

The post Budgie 10.8 Desktop Released with New Trash Applet, Budgie Menu Improvements appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
